title: Executive Order 6020-Reinstatement of Richard H. Knight
content: Mr. Richard H. Knight may be reinstated as a substitute clerk, foot of the roll, in the New York, N.Y., Post Office, without regard to the requirements of the civil- service rules.
This order is recommended by the Postmaster General.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6020-Reinstatement of Richard H. Knight Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361571
